### Seasonal Adjustment for Big Data

[adjust_data.R](https://github.com/michaelfogarty/adjust_data) implements the seasonal adjustment procedure for Big Data series with short time series history outlined in [Tracking U.S. Consumers in Real Time with a New Weekly Index of Retail Trade](https://www.chicagofed.org/publications/working-papers/2021/2021-05)


### Other Software Tools

[importhaver](https://github.com/michaelfogarty/importhaver). This `R` package provides a user-friendly interface for accessing time-series data from Haver Analytics in a tidy format. Requires network access to Haver databases.
